[Groovy] Class RideController

java.lang.Object
  com.moovt.taxi.RideController

class RideController

The RideController is responsible for managing the lifecycle of a Ride

Constructor Detail

RideController

RideController()

 
Method Detail

assignRideToDriver

@Secured(['ROLE_DRIVER','IS_AUTHENTICATED_FULLY'])
java.lang.Object assignRideToDriver()
This API retrieves assigns a Ride to the Driver currently logged in. Please note that a User registered as a Driver must be logged in. Otherwise a Not Authorized exception will be returned. Example: /ride/retrieveUnassignedRideInDriverMetro {}

createRide

@Secured(['ROLE_PASSENGER','IS_AUTHENTICATED_FULLY'	])
java.lang.Object createRide()
This API creates a Ride for the Passenger currently logged in. Please note that a User registered as a Passenger must be logged in. Otherwise a Not Authorized exception will be returned. Example: /moovt/ride/createRide {"pickupDateTime":"2013-03-15 06:30", "pickUpAddress":{"street":"111 Main St","city":"Wheaton","state":"IL","zip":"60107","addressType":"HOME"}, "dropOffAddress":{"street":"999 Main St","city":"Naperville","state":"IL","zip":"60107","addressType":"HOME"} }

main

@Secured(['ROLE_ADMIN','IS_AUTHENTICATED_FULLY'	])
java.lang.Object main()

retrieveAllRides

@Secured(['ROLE_ADMIN','IS_AUTHENTICATED_FULLY'	])
java.lang.Object retrieveAllRides()
This API retrieves all Rides. Only administrators can perform this call. Example: /ride/retrieveAllRides {}

retrieveAllRidesAsJSONP

@Secured(['ROLE_ADMIN','IS_AUTHENTICATED_FULLY'	])
java.lang.Object retrieveAllRidesAsJSONP()
This API retrieves all Rides using the JSONP format. Only administrators can perform this call. Example: /ride/retrieveAllRidesAsJSONP {}

retrievePassengerRides

@Secured(['ROLE_PASSENGER','IS_AUTHENTICATED_FULLY'	])
java.lang.Object retrievePassengerRides()
This API retrieves all Rides created by the Passenger currently logged in. Please note that a User registered as a Passenger must be logged in. Otherwise a Not Authorized exception will be returned.
Parameters:
url - /ride/retrievePassengerRides
input-sample - {}
Returns:
output-sample {"rides":[{"id":1,"version":1,"rideStatus":"UNASSIGNED","driver":null,"passenger":{"id":5},"pickupDateTime":"2013-03-13 20:10","pickUpAddress":{"street":"123 Main St","city":"Wheanton","state":"IL","zip":"00001","addressType":"HOME"},"dropOffAddress":{"street":"123 Main St","city":"Wheanton","state":"IL","zip":"00001","addressType":"HOME"},"rating":null,"comments":null},{"id":2,"version":1,"rideStatus":"UNASSIGNED","driver":null,"passenger":{"id":5},"pickupDateTime":"2013-03-13 20:10","pickUpAddress":{"street":"123 Main St","city":"Wheanton","state":"IL","zip":"00001","addressType":"HOME"},"dropOffAddress":{"street":"123 Main St","city":"Wheanton","state":"IL","zip":"00001","addressType":"HOME"},"rating":null,"comments":null}]}

retrieveUnassignedRideInServedArea

@Secured(['ROLE_DRIVER','IS_AUTHENTICATED_FULLY'])
java.lang.Object retrieveUnassignedRideInServedArea()
This API retrieves all unassigned in the Metro Area of the Driver currently logged in. Please note that a User registered as a Driver must be logged in. Otherwise a Not Authorized exception will be returned. Example: /ride/retrieveUnassignedRideInDriverMetro {}
